TEXT.TITLE: CORROON AND BLACK <CBL> COMPLETE ACQUISITION
TEXT.BODY: Corroon and Black Corp said it completed the acuqisition of <Contractors Planning Group Inc> in an exchange of shares. Contractors is headquartered in Garden City, N.Y., and has branch offices in Philadelphia, Boston, and Cheshire, Conn. Reuter
